summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2116, for the improvement of Alley in Block Forty-nine (49) Yesler's Second Addition to Seattle, Supplemental, King County, W. T., being the alley from East Madison Street to East Thomas Street, and between Twenty-fourth Avenue North and Twenty-fifth Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21210, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
